about_the_game:
Your Grandpa has been kidnapped and it's up to you "Little Grayscale" to go out on the adventure of your life to figure out why and bring him back!!!
Phase between white and black which affects the way you interact with the world to solve puzzles, beat bosses and uncover the truth while proving you're worthy of the title "Mr." in the epic adventure of Mr. Grayscale.



Each level has been hand crafted and designed so that you can play in short bursts and for longer play sessions with enough content to keep you coming back for more. Think you could have beaten a level faster? Well show it the world and yourself with the game saving your best time of every stage you have cleared.




Feeling tired and need a break from saving your Grandpa? Well take a break with one of the many mini games hidden throughout the world of Mr. Grayscale. Complete challenges and collect every hidden coin while beating every level's target time, discovering every secret portal and passageway to hidden worlds on top of setting records to give yourself bragging rights to your friends that you're the number one player of all time!!!


Key Features


  • Story mode
  • Achievements
  • 6+ worlds to explore
  • Boss battles
  • Hidden collectibles
  • Hidden worlds
  • Amazing soundtrack composed by Rhyss Davies
  • Challenge rooms for the hardcore
  • Awesome mini games
  • Rotating stages
  • Record of all your best times for each stage

reviews:
“I’ve played the game on a few different occasions and each time the multiple deaths and failures whisper to an anger that has been dormant since I stopped trying to beat Super Meat Boy”
Elite Gamer IE

“...similar to Fez, but much more simplistic in it’s design, and potentially harder.... I can’t wait to play the finished article.”
Scouse Gamer

“This game really emphasized on the fun and gratification of solving a problem with little help and resources which re-awoke the childhood joy I remember from the SNES era.”
The Sound Architect
short_description: A Retro throwback where you have to platform, rotate the stage and phase through colours to make it to the end of each level as quick as possible.[/img]
